lead_paragraph: The authorities took the tigers from the Tiger Temple in an effort to close the attraction, which has been accused of illegal trade, as soon as this week.

headline.print_headline: Thai Officials Seize 33 Tigers From a Temple, and Have Nearly 100 to Go
headline.main: At ‘Tiger Temple,’ Thai Officials Seize 33 of the Big Cats

snippet: The authorities took the tigers from the Tiger Temple in an effort to close the attraction, which has been accused of illegal trade, as soon as this week.
abstract: Wildlife authorities seize 33 tigers from Thai temple Wat Pha Luang Ta Bua, commonly called the Tiger Temple; temple, while popular tourist attraction, has been accused of misconduct and trading in endangered animals.
